Syrian refugees protested at the Hague o: demanding better amenities and expressing their dissatisfaction with the current conditions in emergency shelters.
The video published on YouTube on 12 Nov: captured by DenHaagTV, showed a woman, who appeared to be a Syrian refugee, complaining about the lack of TVs, food quality, and privacy in the Netherlands.
Various articles were published discussi: slow internet, and their threats to return to Syria if their demands were not met.
Prior articles published in September 20: mentioning their complaints about the lack of cash, slow internet, and limited access to language courses in emergency camps.
